clues.text: When Mr. & Mrs. Fox start a family, the babies are called pups, kits or this, like a bear's
The fantastic Arctic fox changes color with the seasons, from gray or brown in summer to this color in winter
Foxes are members of Canidae, this domestic animal's family
The small gray Bengal fox is found in grassland regions of this subcontinent
Mr. Fox is not so fantastic if you're raising chickens; there's a proverb about not letting him near this "house"

In the kids' book "Granddad's Fishing Buddy", little Sara puts a piece of licorice instead of a worm on this
Doreen Cronin's series of creepy-crawly journals includes this "of a Spider", "of a Fly" & "of a Worm"
In a book by Leo Lionni, this type of worm is proud that he can measure anything
It's really a snake, but this Shakespeare queen asks for "the pretty worm of Nilus, that kills and pains not"

"I Never Told You" this alliteratively named singer hit Disney's Top 30 with "Fallin' For You"; wait, I just did
Lead singer Ryan Tedder of this band has "All The Right Moves"
If this part of a peach is downy or fuzzy, the fruit's called a peach; if it's smooth, a nectarine
Peaches are more than 80% this compound
5-letter word for the hard interior of a peach

These parts of a peach tree grow at nodes along the shoots of the previous season's growth; they're usually pink

99.95% of the mass of an atom is in this part

Of the 6 noble gases on the periodic table, it is the lightest

This sport has an under-17 World Cup every 2 years; Haris Seferovic starred for the 2009 champion Switzerland

His daughter, Svetlana Alliluyeva, returned to the USSR after 17 years in the West

A major study of radial keratotomy, surgery to correct this condition, found it effective

This Ivy League university has been turning out its "Crimson" newspaper since 1873

rounds.text: This WWII icon was created in a 1943 song that says, "That little frail can do more than a male can do"
